msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa, someone just left here<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I guess anything goes on an island. Ha HA!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Have you ever seen
of that size?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It fits in so well, it almost looks like it sprouted up right out of the ground.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Ooh, I just love good It might be a little large, but there's something magical about it.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I feel more relaxed just looking at .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Maybe I should try to max out the zen in my place too Really hit the zen feelings hard!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I can't tell if it's an art installation or just a big mess.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Maybe it's both. Ooh, what a statement

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa! You know you're living on a classy island when you find . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Imagine what someone's keeping inside their house if they can afford such fancy outdoor furnishings

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It's been a while since I've seen . Ah, this takes me back <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I should set up something similar so I can re-live my glory days anytime I want.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Ahh, yes! It's finally starting to feel like an island paradise with certain ! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But waitif your life is a vacation, where do you take your vacations?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hold onis this some kind of new business? What's the for? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I don't know. I'm not really a fan of open-office plans.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Wow, it looks super realistic.<10_4 /> <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But it's fake, right?It's real?! Where did they get the logs to make— Oh, right.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />OK, who pops into your head when you look at ? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's , right? I can't explain it, but it's true.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I was almost mid-bite by the time I realized I was dealing with . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Last time that happened it, turned out I was vitamin C deficient

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Just being face to face with
really sets the stage for me <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I forget—have you already seen my one-man show?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Aww, look. It's !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I loved that kind of thing as a kid.<10_4 /> Who am I kidding—I love it now!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Life's a beach, huh?<10_4 /> <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Well, how else would you explain ?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Did you know that they use nearly indestructible materials to make ? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />See? I can say normal things. The secret is to just repeat the stuff that other folks tell me. Ha HA!
